gw.solr.mapper.query

Class MatchTypeUtil

  • gw.solr.mapper.query.MatchTypeUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class MatchTypeUtil
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Simple tag definitions to allow narrowing of certain search terms when placed at the end of a search criteria string. -e : exact match only : prefix match only -n : synonym (nickname) match only -p : phonetic match only e.g. Searching on "Fred-e" will only score exact matches for "Fred" while ignoring prefix matches such as "Frederick" and nickname matches such as "Alfred" Tag handlers are optional and must be explicitly specified in the query section of the search configuration file for the associated Solr document.
